name: Headlong Hunt
description:
Headlong Hunt is a puzzle game about guiding a skittish animal. Capture it by using simple interactions in surprisingly deep and satisfying ways - be two steps ahead as you choose to hide from sight or send the creature bolting. Think forwards and backwards to set up the perfect path to victory.








Features:
  • Over 100 expertly-crafted puzzles
  • Elegant mechanics which elaborate on the central theme and interact in surprising ways
  • A seamless overworld map, with two main paths and optional islands
  • Unique painterly art style and atmospheric original soundtrack
  • Smooth controls including undo and undo through reset
  • Full controller support and control rebinding
